JobFullDesc: Facebook’s Sustainability team drives sustainability strategy, programs and engagement across the company and with our partners. We seek an experienced Program Manager to lead sustainable design & construction coordination for a portfolio of data center projects in North America and support initiatives that reduce our greenhouse gas footprint and increase our positive impact in the communities where we build. The successful candidate will have strong experience with LEED and be familiar with a wide range of international green building standards.
